name: Godot Shooter RPG
description:
This game is the output of the Godot course on Adam Learns. If you'd like to learn how to create this, check out the course!

The game's controls are relatively simple:

  • WASD: move
  • Q and E: rotate camera
  • 1 and 2: use abilities
  • N: toggle sounds
  • M: toggle music
  • Left-click: fire projectile

Note: the game was created for the sake of teaching Godot, so it is neither complete nor balanced!

Assets used:

  • Sprites - Dungeon Crawl tiles
  • Roboto Google Font
  • Sound effects - SFXR
  • Music - I made it
